```{r, include = FALSE}
library(learnr)
```
## Layering quiz

```{r quiz-layer, echo = FALSE}
quiz(
  question("Which symbol do we use to add a layer in ggplot?",
    answer("`.`"),
    answer("`+`", correct = TRUE),
    answer("`++`"),
    answer("`%>%`"), 
    random_answer_order = TRUE)
)
```
